creator: mathias_jansson@hotmail.com
text:
When using soft-hyphenation in tables in order to fit text in columns, the 
hyphenation has no effect. Thus resulting in text floating over cells.

In general it doesn't seem that there's any handling for text floating over 
cells.

Regards, Mathias

creator: spepping@apache.org
text:
The attachments require other files which are not attached: three xsl files and
an external graphic.

creator: gadams@apache.org
text: unable to reproduce due to lack of reference files; if further action is required, then please provide test input FO file (not an XML/XSLT pair), output PDF file, and console output
batch transition resolved+wontfix to closed+wontfix; if you believe this remains a bug and can demonstrate it with appropriate input FO file and output PDF file (as applicable), then you may reopen
creator: gadams@apache.org
